publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4599 Brian Adam: Aberdeen 3Rs Project—That the Parliament congratulates Aberdeen City Council on finalising the 3Rs project deal, which will refurbishment of one school and the building of nine others and a refurbished sports centre in the city; recognises that this is the biggest school-building programme in the city’s history, and wishes the council and its partners all the best in delivering the rest of the state-of-the-art school buildings, which will soon join the newly opened Heathryburn School. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Bill Kidd, Sandra White, Stuart McMillan, Nigel Don
S3M-4599 Aberdeen 3Rs Project (lodged on 14 July 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4599 Aberdeen 3Rs Project (lodged on 14 July 2009) Maureen Watt*
